short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mirsk Audio Controller makes it possible to control audio on Mirsk Cloud without the browser in focus.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Used with the Mirsk Cloud Dictation System. It enables you to control playback of dictations without the need for Chrome to be in focus. This makes it very easy to transcribe dictations in any program of your choosing. Requires Chrome v35 or later.
